name: Ishihara
description:
Ishihara is a game about exploration, experimentation and interaction with your environment. Solve puzzles and explore other challenges in a world inspired by the idea of colour blindness. Manipulate the colour of everything around you, and be sure to SHOOT EVERYTHING!

Credits:

A game by Alexis Griffin (@forbiddencactus) & Emma Losin (@alpaca_cactus).
